author: Genevieve
text: “ Don't ruin a good today by thinking about a bad yesterday. Let it go. ”

author: Genevieve
text: Because they know nothing will happen to them. This country is on its knees. The ruling party is busy showing us that we the people never mattered. The D.A is showing us natives in the western Cape our poes. All we do is be social media angry. No coup? Just retweets. 😒

author: Genevieve
text: Whenever I come on this app, there is always something new happening. Everybody is outraged and tweets about it. And then tomorrow something new happens and that outrage is forgotten. No wonder south african ministers are being social media influencers and don't do their jobs 1 https://t.co/VxefLGr7Yk

author: Genevieve
text: My niece who is in grade 7, came home and told me they were in EMS and the teacher asked them who taught you about Jan Van Riebeeck And Her class mate shouted @YoungstaCpt. We are led. 😂😂
